text: O vi kred when vi observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) vi shall (1 lav your vizagx (2 lav your brak kubut (3 visx your kap (4 lav your fut maleol. Vi est unclean due al sexual orgasm vi ban. Vi est ill vojagx hav any digestive excretion urinary fecal gas) hav (sexual) kontakt women vi ne trov akv vi observ sek ablution (Tayammum) tusx clean sek soil tiam frot your vizagx man! DI NE wish far RELIGI difficult VI; LI wishes cleanse VI PERFEKT His ben VI VI est appreciative
